backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing authenticated user profiles with membership types using access control and CRUD-like operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing product expansion, placeholder images, and cart behavior requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling utilities across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables with OKLCH color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root element and loading main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling client-side routing across pages, providing theme, query, and cart context providers.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart items, totals, and update operations with memoized state.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for Product and CartItem used in the cart system.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: Hook exposing cart context with a safety guard to ensure proper provider usage.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: App layout with header, footer navigation, and dynamic cart badge integrated with route navigation.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with toast notifications and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for first‑time profile creation, submitting display name and default membership type via backend hook.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wrapper component that requires an authenticated Internet Identity and shows a sign‑in card if missing.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Exports a static list of gourmet product definitions with pricing and image metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and membership selections via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theming and typography.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats numbers as USD currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/membershipPlanUrls.ts: Maps membership types to external subscription URLs and exposes a lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function to merge Tailwind class names with clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Root render file that sets up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with remove actions and order summary, using cart state and currency formatting.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero text, feature highlights, an about section, and a footer with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Displays three subscription plans with pricing, features, and a subscribe handler that redirects to external URLs.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipsPage.tsx: Shows membership tiers integrated with Internet Identity, allowing users to select plans and persist the choice via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of products with images, prices, and an option to add items to the cart with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Authenticated profile page showing user details, membership status, and conditional setup prompts.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms and conditions page with scrollable legal sections outlining membership rules and policies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params from query or hash, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app scope, design requirements, product image needs, known issues, and existing features.
